text: Taraji P. Henson (born September 11, 1970) is an American actress. She has been in many movies. She played Shug in the movie Hustle and Flow. She later played Queenie in The Curious Case of Benjamin Button. She also played Katherine Johnson in the movie Hidden Figures. Henson was born in Washington, D.C.. Category:American movie actors Category:1970 births Category:Living people
title: Taraji P. Henson
